metadata.description: This data was derived from "1: 100,000 Land Use Data of China". Based on Landsat MSS, TM and ETM remote sensing data, 1: 100,000 Land Use Data of China was compiled within three years by a remote sensing scientific and technological team of 19 research institutes affiliated to the Chinese Academy of Sciences, which was organized by the “Remote Sensing Macroinvestigation and Dynamic Research on the National Resources and Environment", one of the major application programs in Chinese Academy of Sciences during the "Eighth Five-year Plan". This data adopts a hierarchical land cover classification system, which divides the country into 6 first-class categories (cultivated land, forest land, grassland, water area, urban and rural areas, industrial and mining areas, residential land and unused land) and 31 second-class categories. This is the most accurate land use data product in our country at present. It has already played an important role in national land resources survey, hydrology and ecological research.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据来源于“中国1:10万土地利用数据”。中国1:10万土地利用数据是由中国科学院“八五”重大应用项目《全国资源环境遥感宏观调查与动态研究》组织了中国科学院所属19个研究所的遥感科技队伍，以卫星遥感为手段，在三年内基于Landsat MSS，TM和ETM遥感数据构建的。本数据采用一个分层的土地覆盖分类系统，将全国分为6个一级类（耕地、林地、草地、水域、城乡、工矿、居民用地和未利用土地），31个二级类。这是目前我国精度最高的土地利用数据产品，已经在国家土地资源调查、水文、生态研究中发挥着重要作用。

background: Land-use/cover change has become an event being of paramount importance to the study of global environmental change. Land-cover change is closely related to the terrestrial surface material cycles and life-support processes, i.e., the interaction between biosphere and atmosphere, biodiversity, biogeochemical cycle and sustainable exploitation of resources. The series of scientific study programs, issued and promoted by IGBP and IHDP in 1995, make the study of land-use and land-cover change (LUCC) become one of the hot topics in the global environmental change study. As a developing but booming country, China has formulated a series of policies exerting great influence on the land-use change. In addition, due to varied physical environments and vast land areas, its land-use changes not only influence the social and economic development but also impact the global change accordingly.
research objective: In this paper, the division of dynamic regionalization of land-use change is designed, for the sake of revealing the temporal and spatial features of land-use change and laying the foundation for the study of regional scale land-use changes. The paper exerts an effective effort on the integrated studies of “spatial pattern” and “temporal process” for land-use change to reveal the regional land-use change characteristics on the pattern of dynamic process and dynamic process of pattern.
challenges: It is too early to say that the trend of deforestation has been effectively reversed across China. There also exist conspicuous conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion, as showed in the irrational conversion from arable land to built-up areas.
dataset: The main data sources are Landsat TM digital images (520 scenes in 1995/1996 and 508 scenes in 1999/2000). Apart from that, the CBERS-1 (China-Brazil Earth Resources Satellite 1) data were also used to acquire land-use information for 1999/2000.
findings: There exists conspicuous regional differentiation of land-use change in China, which lays the foundation to draw the dynamic zones. The rapid change of land-use change during 1995—2000 happened in North China, Loess Plateau—agricultural and pasturing interlaced area, Northeast China, southeast coastal region, middle and lower reaches of Yangtze River, eastern coastal region.
backgroundCn: 土地利用/覆盖变化已成为全球环境变化研究中至关重要的事件。土地覆盖变化与陆地表面物质循环和生命支持过程密切相关，即生物圈与大气、 biodiversity、生物地球化学循环以及资源的可持续开发之间的相互作用。1995年，IGBP和IHDP发布并推动的一系列科学研究计划，使得土地利用和土地覆盖变化（LUCC）的研究成为全球环境变化研究的热门话题。作为一个发展中但蓬勃发展的国家，中国制定了一系列对土地利用变化产生重大影响的政策。此外，由于物理环境的多样性和广阔的土地面积，其土地利用变化不仅影响社会和经济发展，也对全球变化产生相应的影响。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，土地利用变化的动态区域划分旨在揭示土地利用变化的时间和空间特征，并为区域尺度土地利用变化的研究奠定基础。本文有效地对土地利用变化的“空间模式”和“时间过程”进行了综合研究，以揭示区域土地利用变化特征在动态过程的模式和动态模式的过程。
challengesCn: 目前还为时尚早，无法说中国的森林砍伐趋势已经有效逆转。同时，耕地保护与城市扩张之间也存在明显的冲突，表现为耕地向建筑用地的不合理转化。
datasetCn: 主要数据来源是1995/1996年的Landsat TM数字图像（520幅场景）和1999/2000年的Landsat TM数字图像（508幅场景）。此外，还使用了CBERS-1（中巴地球资源卫星1号）数据，以获取1999/2000年的土地利用信息。
findingsCn: 中国的土地利用变化存在明显的区域差异，这为划定动态区域奠定了基础。在1995年至2000年期间，北方地区、黄土高原—农业与牧区交错区、东北地区、东南沿海地区、长江中下游地区以及东部沿海地区的土地利用变化迅速。

background: Land cover plays a significant role in Earth system science, which reflects the influence of human activities and environmental changes. Reliable and up-to-date land cover data are very important for land, ecological and hydrological modelling, carbon and water cycle study as well as global climatic change study. Many land use/cover maps at global, continental, and regional scales have been produced in recent years using remote sensing. These four global land cover maps are all derived from remote sensing data and created for the same fundamental purpose of providing improved land cover information for scientific studies and environmental monitoring, but they are different in mapping methods, data sources, and classification systems.
research objective: The objective of this paper is to evaluate the application of the four popular land cover maps over China land mass. The possibility of developing a new land cover map whose classification is compatible with a well-accepted legend system but whose accuracy is more reliable also motivates this study.
challenges: The four maps used different classification systems, which made the comparison difficult. We conclude that the accuracies of all the datasets cannot meet the requirements of land surface modelling. For the reference data, i.e. the 1:100 000 land cover map, the classification system needs to be transferred to a well-recognized one that has been used commonly in land surface modelling.
methods: We compare and evaluate four land cover datasets over China. So we first aggregated these maps by reclassifying them using a unified legend system. A large-scale, i.e. 1:100 000 land cover map of China was used as the reference data to validate the four maps.
dataset: The datasets include the Version 2 global land cover dataset of IGBP, MODIS land cover map 2001, a global land cover map produced by the University of Maryland, and the land cover map produced by the global land cover for the year 2000 (GLC 2000) project coordinated by the Global Vegetation Monitoring Unit of the European Commission Joint Research Centre. The large-scale (1:100 000) land use map of China in 2000, which was produced by Chinese Academy of Science to meet large-scale resource survey and land use mapping, was used as truth to validate the four land cover maps over China.
findings: The results show that the GLC2000 land cover map represents the highest accuracy. The MODIS land cover map ranks second for type area consistency and third for sub-fraction overall accuracy compared with reference data. The IGBP land cover map has good labelling accuracy, although it has a local labelling error and third consistency for type area. The labelling accuracy and type area consistency for the reference data of UMd land cover map is low.
backgroundCn: 土地覆盖在地球系统科学中发挥着重要作用，反映了人类活动和环境变化的影响。可靠和最新的土地覆盖数据对于土地、生态和水文建模、碳和水循环研究以及全球气候变化研究非常重要。近年来，许多全球、洲际和区域尺度的土地利用/覆盖图已经通过遥感技术制作。这四个全球土地覆盖图都是基于遥感数据生成的，旨在为科学研究和环境监测提供改进的土地覆盖信息，但它们在制图方法、数据来源和分类系统上有所不同。
research objectiveCn: 本文的目的是评估四种流行的中国土地覆盖地图的应用。开发一幅与公认的分类系统兼容但准确性更可靠的新土地覆盖地图的可能性也激励了本研究。
challengesCn: 这四个地图使用了不同的分类系统，这使得比较变得困难。我们得出结论，所有数据集的准确性都无法满足地表建模的要求。对于参考数据，即1:100,000的土地覆盖图，分类系统需要转化为一个在地表建模中常用的公认系统。
methodsCn: 我们对中国的四个土地覆盖数据集进行了比较和评估。首先，我们通过使用统一的图例系统对这些地图进行了重新分类。我们使用了一幅大比例尺（1:100,000）的中国土地覆盖图作为参考数据来验证这四幅地图。
datasetCn: 数据集包括IGBP的版本2全球土地覆盖数据集、2001年MODIS土地覆盖图、由马里兰大学制作的全球土地覆盖图，以及由欧洲委员会联合研究中心全球植被监测单位协调的2000年全球土地覆盖图（GLC 2000）项目制作的土地覆盖图。中国科学院在2000年制作的大比例尺（1:100,000）土地利用图用于满足大规模资源调查和土地利用制图，作为验证中国境内四个土地覆盖图的真实数据。
findingsCn: 结果显示，GLC2000土地覆盖图的准确性最高。MODIS土地覆盖图在类型面积一致性方面排名第二，在与参考数据相比的子分数整体准确性方面排名第三。IGBP土地覆盖图具有良好的标记准确性，尽管存在局部标记错误，并且在类型面积一致性方面排名第三。UMd土地覆盖图的参考数据的标记准确性和类型面积一致性较低。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to validate land cover datasets in China?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于验证中国土地覆盖数据集的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method used to validate land cover datasets in China involves aggregating maps by reclassifying them using a unified legend system and using a large-scale (1:100 000) land cover map of China as the reference data to validate other land cover maps.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种用于验证中国土地覆盖数据集的数据收集方法是通过使用统一的图例系统对地图进行重分类，并使用中国的大比例尺（1:100,000）土地覆盖图作为参考数据来验证其他土地覆盖图。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of the types of challenges faced when comparing different land use/cover datasets?
Example.QuestionCn: 比较不同土地利用/覆盖数据集时面临的挑战的一个例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge faced when comparing land use/cover datasets is the use of different classification systems, which complicates the comparison process and affects the accuracies required for land surface modelling.
Example.AnswerCn: 在比较土地利用/覆盖数据集时面临的一个挑战是使用不同的分类系统，这使得比较过程变得复杂，并影响了土地表面建模所需的准确性。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset used to study land-use change in China during the late 1990s?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于研究1990年代末中国土地利用变化的数据集的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset used for studying land-use change in China during the late 1990s includes Landsat TM digital images from 1995/1996 and 1999/2000, as well as CBERS-1 data for land-use information in 1999/2000.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个用于研究中国在1990年代末土地利用变化的数据集包括1995/1996年的Landsat TM数字图像和1999/2000年的Landsat TM数字图像，以及1999/2000年的CBERS-1数据用于土地利用信息。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'land-use/cover change' entail in the context of global environmental change studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: “土地利用/覆盖变化”在全球环境变化研究的背景下，涉及土地的使用方式和覆盖类型的变化，这些变化可能是由于自然过程或人类活动引起的。这些变化对生态系统、气候、土壤质量和生物多样性等方面有重要影响。
Definition.AnswerEn: Land-use/cover change refers to alterations in the terrestrial surface material cycles and life-support processes, impacting the interaction between the biosphere and atmosphere, biodiversity, biogeochemical cycles, and the sustainable exploitation of resources.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土地利用/覆盖变化是指对陆地表面物质循环和生命支持过程的改变，影响生物圈与大气之间的相互作用、生物多样性、生物地球化学循环以及资源的可持续开发。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by a 'land cover map' in the context of remote sensing data?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据的背景下，“土地覆盖图”是指通过遥感技术获取的、显示地表不同类型覆盖情况的地图。这些覆盖类型可以包括森林、草地、水体、城市区域、农田等。土地覆盖图通常用于环境监测、资源管理和土地利用规划等领域。
Definition.AnswerEn: A land cover map is a representation derived from remote sensing data that provides information on the types of land cover present in an area, which is vital for scientific studies and environmental monitoring.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖图是从遥感数据中提取的表示，提供了某一区域内存在的土地覆盖类型的信息，这对于科学研究和环境监测至关重要。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods used for the 1:100,000 land use map of China compare with those used for the global land cover maps like MODIS and GLC 2000?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 中国1:100,000土地利用地图的数据收集方法与全球土地覆盖地图（如MODIS和GLC 2000）使用的方法相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The 1:100,000 land use map of China was produced using Landsat TM and CBERS-1 satellite data, focusing on large-scale land use mapping at a detailed resolution. In contrast, global land cover maps like MODIS and GLC 2000 utilize different remote sensing data sources and classification systems to create broader-scale maps aimed at providing improved land cover information for scientific studies and environmental monitoring.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 中国的1:100,000土地利用地图是利用Landsat TM和CBERS-1卫星数据制作的，重点是以详细分辨率进行大规模土地利用制图。相比之下，全球土地覆盖地图如MODIS和GLC 2000则采用不同的遥感数据源和分类系统，旨在提供更广泛的地图，以便为科学研究和环境监测提供改进的土地覆盖信息。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are potential challenges in harmonizing classification systems across different land cover datasets, and how might these challenges be addressed?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在不同土地覆盖数据集之间协调分类系统时，可能面临的挑战包括：分类标准的不一致性、数据收集方法的差异、时间和空间分辨率的不同、以及不同地区的生态和社会经济背景的多样性。为了解决这些挑战，可以采取以下措施：建立统一的分类标准和框架、采用标准化的数据收集和处理方法、进行跨区域的比较研究以识别和调整差异、以及加强不同研究机构和国家之间的合作与沟通。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: One potential challenge is the use of different classification systems across datasets, which complicates comparisons. Addressing this involves reclassifying datasets using a unified legend system, which can facilitate better evaluation and comparison as demonstrated by the analysis of four global land cover maps over China.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 一个潜在的挑战是不同数据集使用不同的分类系统，这使得比较变得复杂。解决这个问题的方法是使用统一的图例系统对数据集进行重新分类，这可以促进更好的评估和比较，正如对中国四个全球土地覆盖地图的分析所示。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the variation in land-use change dynamics across different regions in China during the 1995-2000 period?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 1995-2000年期间，中国不同地区土地利用变化动态的差异原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The variation in land-use change dynamics across China is influenced by conspicuous regional differentiation, which is linked to varied physical environments and vast land areas, leading to rapid changes in specific regions such as North China, Loess Plateau—agricultural and pasturing interlaced area, Northeast China, southeast coastal region, middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River, and eastern coastal region.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 中国土地利用变化动态的差异受到明显的区域差异的影响，这与多样的自然环境和广阔的土地面积有关，导致特定区域如华北、黄土高原—农业与牧业交错区、东北地区、东南沿海地区、长江中下游地区以及东部沿海地区的快速变化。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why do land cover datasets vary in their accuracy and classification systems when applied to land surface modeling in China?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在中国应用于地表建模的土地覆盖数据集在准确性和分类系统上会有所不同？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Land cover datasets vary in their accuracy and classification systems due to the use of different mapping methods, data sources, and classification systems. This variation makes comparison difficult and indicates that the accuracies of the datasets may not meet the requirements for land surface modeling.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖数据集由于使用不同的制图方法、数据来源和分类系统，其准确性和分类系统各异。这种差异使得比较变得困难，并表明这些数据集的准确性可能无法满足地表建模的要求。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the conflict between arable land protection and urban expansion in China's land-use changes?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致中国土地利用变化中耕地保护与城市扩张之间冲突的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The conflict between arable land protection and urban expansion is primarily caused by the irrational conversion from arable land to built-up areas, which is a significant challenge in effectively managing land-use changes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 耕地保护与城市扩张之间的冲突主要是由于耕地向建筑用地的不合理转化，这在有效管理土地利用变化方面是一个重大挑战。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals behind utilizing satellite remote sensing technologies like Landsat and CBERS-1 for collecting land-use data in China?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 利用卫星遥感技术，如Landsat和CBERS-1，收集中国土地利用数据的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to acquire comprehensive and accurate land-use information that can be used to study land-use/cover change, which is crucial for understanding the interaction between the biosphere and atmosphere, biodiversity, biogeochemical cycles, and sustainable resource exploitation.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是获取全面准确的土地利用信息，以便研究土地利用/覆盖变化，这对于理解生物圈与大气之间的相互作用、生物多样性、生物地球化学循环以及可持续资源开发至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to evaluate multiple global land cover maps to develop a new land cover map for China?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 评估多个全球土地覆盖地图对于开发中国的新土地覆盖地图是必要的，原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The aim is to create a land cover map with a classification system that is compatible with well-accepted legend systems, ensuring accuracy and reliability for use in land, ecological, and hydrological modeling as well as climate change studies.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是创建一个土地覆盖地图，采用与公认的图例系统兼容的分类系统，确保在土地、生态和水文建模以及气候变化研究中具有准确性和可靠性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the importance of developing a dynamic regionalization of land-use change in China?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在中国，开发动态区域化的土地利用变化的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to reveal the temporal and spatial features of land-use change, providing a foundation for studying regional scale land-use changes and understanding the impact of China's varied physical environments on social, economic development, and global change.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是揭示土地利用变化的时间和空间特征，为研究区域尺度的土地利用变化提供基础，并理解中国多样的自然环境对社会、经济发展和全球变化的影响。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures can be implemented to integrate satellite-derived data with existing land use maps to enhance their accuracy in land-use change studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以实施哪些程序将卫星获取的数据与现有土地利用地图集成，以提高土地利用变化研究的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: A potential approach involves using Landsat TM digital images and CBERS-1 data to acquire land-use information. These datasets were used for capturing land-use change information and could be compared or integrated with existing land use maps to enhance accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 一种潜在的方法是使用Landsat TM数字图像和CBERS-1数据来获取土地利用信息。这些数据集用于捕捉土地利用变化信息，并可以与现有的土地利用地图进行比较或整合，以提高准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can different land cover classification systems be standardized for effective comparison and validation of land cover datasets?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何对不同的土地覆盖分类系统进行标准化，以便有效比较和验证土地覆盖数据集？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To standardize different land cover classification systems, one can reclassify datasets using a unified legend system. For validation, a large-scale reference map, such as the 1:100,000 land cover map of China, can be used to compare the datasets and assess their accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了标准化不同的土地覆盖分类系统，可以使用统一的图例系统对数据集进行重新分类。为了验证，可以使用大规模的参考地图，例如1:100,000的中国土地覆盖地图，来比较数据集并评估它们的准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are necessary to evaluate the accuracy of global land cover datasets over a specific region like China?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn:
评估特定区域（如中国）全球土地覆盖数据集的准确性所需的步骤包括：

1. **选择研究区域**：确定要评估的具体区域，例如中国的某个省或城市。

2. **收集参考数据**：获取高质量的参考数据，这些数据可以是地面调查、遥感影像或其他可靠的土地覆盖数据集。

3. **数据预处理**：对全球土地覆盖数据集和参考数据进行预处理，以确保它们在空间和时间上具有可比性。这可能包括数据格式转换、投影变换和时间匹配。

4. **样本选择**：从研究区域中随机选择样本点，以便进行准确性评估。样本点的数量应足够大，以确保结果的统计显著性。

5. **分类验证**：在每个样本点上，比较全球土地覆盖数据集的分类结果与参考数据的实际情况，记录每个样本点的分类结果。

6. **计算准确性指标**：使用混淆矩阵计算总体准确率、用户准确率、生产者准确率和Kappa系数等指标，以量化数据集的准确性。

7. **分析结果**：分析准确性指标，识别数据集的优缺点，了解不同土地覆盖类型的分类表现。

8. **报告和发布**：将评估结果整理成报告，讨论研究的局限性和未来的改进建议，并考虑将结果发布以供其他研究人员参考。

9. **持续监测**：建议定期更新和监测土地覆盖数据集的准确性，以适应环境变化和数据集的更新。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The evaluation involves aggregating the global land cover datasets by reclassifying them using a unified legend system. The large-scale land use map of China can serve as reference data to validate these datasets, ensuring their compatibility and reliability over the region.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 评估涉及通过使用统一的图例系统对全球土地覆盖数据集进行重新分类来进行汇总。中国的大规模土地利用地图可以作为参考数据来验证这些数据集，确保它们在该地区的兼容性和可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the integration of satellite remote sensing data for high-precision land use mapping?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论能够实现卫星遥感数据的高精度土地利用制图集成？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The methodologies involve using satellite remote sensing data such as Landsat MSS, TM, and ETM, as well as CBERS-1 data, which provide the foundation for constructing detailed land use maps, with a classification system that divides land into multiple categories.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及使用卫星遥感数据，如Landsat MSS、TM和ETM，以及CBERS-1数据，这些数据为构建详细的土地利用地图提供了基础，分类系统将土地划分为多个类别。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do remote sensing advancements facilitate the evaluation of multiple global land cover maps for regional application?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 遥感技术的进步如何促进多个全球土地覆盖地图在区域应用中的评估？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Remote sensing advancements allow the comparison and evaluation of various global land cover datasets, such as MODIS and GLC2000, by reclassifying them using a unified legend system and validating against a large-scale reference map like the 1:100 000 land use map of China.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 遥感技术的进步使得可以通过使用统一的分类系统对各种全球土地覆盖数据集（如MODIS和GLC2000）进行比较和评估，并与像中国1:100,000土地利用图这样的高比例尺参考地图进行验证。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or challenges influence the accuracy of land-use change assessments and land cover map comparisons?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 影响土地利用变化评估和土地覆盖地图比较准确性的条件或挑战有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include varied classification systems across different maps, the need for a compatible and well-recognized legend system, and the requirement for high accuracy in datasets to meet the demands of land surface modeling.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括不同地图之间分类系统的多样性、对兼容且广泛认可的图例系统的需求，以及满足土地表面建模要求的高数据集准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it expected that different classification systems in land cover datasets may lead to challenges in comparing and integrating these datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 不同的土地覆盖数据集中的分类系统可能会导致比较和整合这些数据集时出现挑战，这是为什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The four maps used different classification systems, which made the comparison difficult. This indicates that varying classification systems can hinder direct comparison and integration due to inconsistencies in categorization, which could affect the reliability and applicability of the datasets for land surface modelling and other analyses.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 这四张地图使用了不同的分类系统，这使得比较变得困难。这表明，不同的分类系统可能会由于分类不一致而妨碍直接比较和整合，这可能会影响数据集在土地表面建模和其他分析中的可靠性和适用性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it expected that large-scale land cover maps with higher classification accuracy are necessary for reliable land surface modelling?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么预计需要具有更高分类精度的大规模土地覆盖地图，以便进行可靠的地表建模？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The accuracies of all the datasets cannot meet the requirements of land surface modelling. The large-scale (1:100 000) land use map of China was used as truth to validate the four land cover maps over China. This indicates that higher accuracy in classification is essential to ensure the reliability of models that depend on precise land cover information to simulate environmental and climatic processes.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 所有数据集的准确性都无法满足土地表面建模的要求。中国的大比例尺（1:100,000）土地利用图被用作真实数据，以验证中国四个土地覆盖图。这表明，分类的高准确性对于确保依赖精确土地覆盖信息来模拟环境和气候过程的模型的可靠性至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective do you think current remote sensing techniques are in capturing the nuances of land-use change, and what improvements could be made?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您认为当前的遥感技术在捕捉土地利用变化的细微差别方面有多有效？可以做哪些改进？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Remote sensing techniques, such as those using Landsat TM and CBERS-1 data, have been effective in capturing regional differentiation of land-use change. However, challenges remain in classification system compatibility and accuracy for land surface modeling. Further improvements could involve developing a unified classification system and enhancing data accuracy through advanced sensor technologies.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 遥感技术，如使用Landsat TM和CBERS-1数据，已有效捕捉区域土地利用变化的差异。然而，在分类系统的兼容性和土地表面建模的准确性方面仍然存在挑战。进一步的改进可以包括开发统一的分类系统和通过先进的传感器技术提高数据准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the main challenges in achieving a consistent classification system for land-use datasets, and how can they be addressed?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在实现土地利用数据集的一致分类系统时，主要挑战是什么，以及如何解决这些挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The main challenges include the varied classification systems used in different datasets, making comparisons difficult. Addressing these challenges may require aggregating maps using a unified legend system and adjusting existing classification systems to align with well-recognized models used in land surface modeling.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 主要挑战包括不同数据集中使用的分类系统各异，使得比较变得困难。解决这些挑战可能需要使用统一的图例系统对地图进行汇总，并调整现有的分类系统，以与用于地表建模的公认模型保持一致。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What potential do you see for integrating different global land cover maps to improve the accuracy of land-use studies, and what methods might facilitate this integration?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我看到整合不同全球土地覆盖地图以提高土地利用研究准确性的潜力，可能的方法包括：使用遥感技术、地理信息系统（GIS）、机器学习算法以及数据融合技术等。这些方法可以帮助整合不同来源的数据，提升土地覆盖分类的精度和一致性。
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating different global land cover maps holds potential for improving accuracy, as shown by the evaluation of maps like GLC2000 and MODIS. Methods that might facilitate this integration include reclassifying maps using a common legend system and validating them against large-scale reference data to ensure consistency and accuracy.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 整合不同的全球土地覆盖地图具有提高准确性的潜力，正如对GLC2000和MODIS等地图的评估所示。可以促进这种整合的方法包括使用共同的分类系统对地图进行重新分类，并通过大规模参考数据进行验证，以确保一致性和准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced when comparing different land cover datasets for a region as large as China.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对比较像中国这样大区域的不同土地覆盖数据集时面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The main challenge in comparing different land cover datasets is the variation in classification systems used by each dataset, which complicates direct comparison. Additionally, accuracy levels of datasets may not meet the requirements for certain applications, necessitating reclassification and validation using a reference map.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 比较不同土地覆盖数据集的主要挑战在于各数据集使用的分类系统存在差异，这使得直接比较变得复杂。此外，数据集的准确性水平可能无法满足某些应用的要求，因此需要使用参考地图进行重新分类和验证。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of the significance of using a unified legend system in evaluating multiple land cover maps.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解在评估多个土地覆盖地图时使用统一图例系统的重要性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: A unified legend system allows for the aggregation and reclassification of different land cover maps, facilitating a consistent comparison. This approach helps in evaluating the accuracy and utility of various datasets in representing land cover information reliably for scientific studies and environmental monitoring.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 统一的图例系统允许对不同的土地覆盖地图进行聚合和重新分类，从而促进了一致的比较。这种方法有助于评估各种数据集在可靠地表示土地覆盖信息方面的准确性和实用性，以便于科学研究和环境监测。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline potential datasets that could be used to validate land cover mapping accuracy and discuss how these datasets contribute to enhancing land-use change studies.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请概述可以用于验证土地覆盖制图准确性的潜在数据集，并讨论这些数据集如何有助于增强土地利用变化研究。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets for validating land cover mapping accuracy include the Version 2 global land cover dataset of IGBP, MODIS land cover map 2001, University of Maryland's global land cover map, and the GLC 2000 project map. These datasets provide various classification perspectives and data sources, which can be validated against a large-scale map like the 1:100 000 land use map of China to improve the reliability and accuracy of land-use change studies.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的验证土地覆盖制图准确性的数据集包括IGBP的版本2全球土地覆盖数据集、MODIS 2001年土地覆盖图、马里兰大学的全球土地覆盖图以及GLC 2000项目地图。这些数据集提供了不同的分类视角和数据来源，可以与中国1:100,000的土地利用图进行验证，以提高土地利用变化研究的可靠性和准确性。
